name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary: Full Stack Developer with 10+ years of experience specializing in **C#**, **.NET**, and **Angular** for high-performance software solutions. Proficient in building APIs and implementing **Domain-Driven Design** to ensure robust architecture. Experienced in collaboration and product management, driving projects with proactivity and strong communication. Skilled in modern technologies including **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, with a complete hands-on expertise in the full stack using **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Proficient in building and deploying cloud-native applications on **Azure** and **AWS**, and adept in developing enterprise platforms that integrate AI/ML capabilities for real-time analytics and intelligent decision-making. Strong background in microservices architecture and CI/CD automation, creating secure and maintainable solutions compliant with standards such as HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2. Brings practical experience in MLOps from developing ML pipelines to managing production workflows using tools like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**. Passionate about delivering systems that are technically sound and driven by real-world impact.
